formal_name:
The Mysterious Cities
of Gold: Secret Paths
description:
Play Esteban, Zia and Tao through numerous tricky levels full of puzzles, traps and infiltration phases in a wide variety of diverse gorgeous settings. Explore every nook and cranny of China, and escape Zarès’ hostile men, searching for the local City of Gold.

You get to play with all the main characters of the famous Mysterious Cities of Gold anime. Each hero has his own set of attributes. Pick between them wisely - Their personality matters when facing the different challenges!
